request_data.name: Request data
request_data.description: Requests new data from the charging station.

authorize.name: Authorize
authorize.description: Authorizes a charging process with the predefined RFID tag of the configuration file.

deauthorize.name: Deauthorize
deauthorize.description: Deauthorizes the running charging process with the predefined RFID tag of the configuration file.

set_energy.name: Set energy
set_energy.description: Sets the energy target after which the charging process stops.

energy.name: Energy
energy.description: The energy target to stop charging. Setting 0 disables the limit.

set_current.name: Set current
set_current.description: Sets the maximum current for charging processes.

current.name: Current
current.description: The maximum current used for the charging process. The value is depending on the DIP-switch settings and the used cable of the charging station.

enable.name: [%key:common::action::enable%]
enable.description: Starts a charging process if charging station is authorized.

disable.name: [%key:common::action::disable%]
disable.description: Stops the charging process if charging station is authorized.

set_failsafe.name: Set failsafe
set_failsafe.description: Sets the failsafe mode of the charging station. If all parameters are 0, the failsafe mode will be disabled.

failsafe_timeout.name: Failsafe timeout
failsafe_timeout.description: Timeout after which the failsafe mode is triggered if the 'Set current' action was not run during this time.

failsafe_fallback.name: Failsafe fallback
failsafe_fallback.description: Fallback current to be set after timeout.

failsafe_persist.name: Failsafe persist
failsafe_persist.description: If set to 0, the failsafe option will be disabled after a charging station reboot. If set to 1, the failsafe option will survive a reboot.
